ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 cup white sugar, 1 cup milk, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 3 cups pitted tart red cherries, 1 cup white sugar,   +   1/4 teaspoon almond extract
nutrition: Total Fat 3g 4%, Saturated Fat 1g 4%, Cholesterol 2mg 1%, Sodium 93mg 4%, Total Carbohydrate 56g 21%, Dietary Fiber 1g 5%, Total Sugars 40g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 3mg 13%, Calcium 79mg 6%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 135mg 3%
